entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
